name: WizardEntry

properties.name: c8yIcon
properties.description: The icon that will be shown in the wizard menu next to the item.
properties.rawdescription: The icon that will be shown in the wizard menu next to the item.

properties.name: component
properties.description: The component that will be rendered when this entry is selected in the wizard's menu. If path is provided, the component will be ignored.
properties.rawdescription: The component that will be rendered when this entry is selected in the wizard's menu. If `path` is provided, the `component` will be ignored.

properties.name: injector
properties.description: The injector to use. If not set, default injector will be used.
properties.rawdescription: The injector to use. If not set, default injector will be used.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name that will be displayed in the wizard menu
properties.rawdescription: The name that will be displayed in the wizard menu

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path where user will be redirected when this entry is selected in the wizard's menu. Takes precedence over component property.
properties.rawdescription: The path where user will be redirected when this entry is selected in the wizard's menu. Takes precedence over `component` property.

properties.name: wizardId
properties.description: The identifier of a wizard to which the entry will be hooked. Example: "wizardId".
properties.rawdescription:
The identifier of a wizard to which the entry will be hooked.
Example: "wizardId".

description: A single item in the wizard. An interface describing the entry displayed in the first step of the wizard as well as the configuration of the second step and their way of interaction.
rawdescription:
A single item in the wizard.
An interface describing the entry displayed in the first step of the wizard as well as the configuration of the second step and their way of interaction.
